short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reminds user of something he given as input

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension takes care of reminding you of anything when you are getting carried away with something else in the specified time intervals and will help you in avoiding any schedule slippage. It can be used for the work related things like you need to have a talk to your supervisor regarding the leave and you are in the middle of something very sincerely. In order not to forget your leave plan, this extension can be used to remind you after a specific interval of time. In the same manner you can use it for your personal matters like health care such as water intake at regular intervals, Tea time, evening walk or Gym Timings.In this manner, this extension helps you in keeping your plan in a proper manner without any slippage. In the recent update we enabled users to select upto 6 hours of duration. We enable error messages to be displayed to the user. Also we have given the success notification as well when user completes the setup process successfully.
